title: HoP 353 - The Good Place - Utopias in the Italian Renaissance
itunes:title: HoP 353 - The Good Place - Utopias in the Italian Renaissance
description: Tommaso Campanella’s “The City of the Sun” and other utopian works of the Italian Renaissance describe perfect cities as an ideal for real life politics.
